update APRO_RULE_INFO
PRD_CODE = #{prdCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRD_NAME = #{prdName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APPLY_TYPE = #{applyType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHECK_RESULT = #{checkResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_BEA_RELATE = #{isBeaRelate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AML_TYPE = #{amlType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

ALS_D15_CELL_NBANK_ORGNUM = #{alsD15CellNbankOrgnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ALS_D15_ID_NBANK_ORGNUM = #{alsD15IdNbankOrgnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ALS_M3_ID_NBANK_ORGNUM = #{alsM3IdNbankOrgnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ALS_M3_ID_NBANK_ALLNUM = #{alsM3IdNbankAllnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ALS_M3_CELL_NBANK_ORGNUM = #{alsM3CellNbankOrgnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ALS_M3_CELL_NBANK_ALLNUM = #{alsM3CellNbankAllnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FINAL_DECISION = #{finalDecision,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_RISK_TRADE = #{isRiskTrade,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_BAN_PRO = #{isBanPro,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AUTH_FIN_LAST_1M_CNT = #{authFinLast1mCnt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AUTH_FIN_LAST_3M_CNT = #{authFinLast3mCnt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AUTH_FIN_LAST_6M_CNT = #{authFinLast6mCnt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OVD_ORDER_CNT_6M = #{ovdOrderCnt6m,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OVD_ORDER_AMT_6M = #{ovdOrderAmt6m,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZM_SCORE = #{zmScore,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREDIT_LINE = #{creditLine,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INCOME_DEBT_RAT = #{incomeDebtRat,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INPUT_DATE = #{inputDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INPUT_TIME = #{inputTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CBM_CODE = #{cbmCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INDUSTRY_CODE = #{industryCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FLAG_EXECUTION = #{flagExecution,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ASSET_SCORE = #{assetScore,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREDIT_INFO_XA01 = #{creditInfoXa01,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREDIT_INFO_XA02 = #{creditInfoXa02,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREDIT_INFO_XA03 = #{creditInfoXa03,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREDIT_INFO_XA04 = #{creditInfoXa04,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREDIT_INFO_XA05 = #{creditInfoXa05,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREDIT_INFO_XA06 = #{creditInfoXa06,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREDIT_INFO_XA07 = #{creditInfoXa07,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREDIT_INFO_XA08 = #{creditInfoXa08,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BLACK_SOURCE = #{blackSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BLACK_SCORE = #{blackScore,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_CLEAR = #{isClear,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CURR_BAL = #{currBal,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OVERDUE_D30_NUM = #{overdueD30Num,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHITE_SCORE = #{whiteScore,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PERFORMANCE = #{performance,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IDENTITY = #{identity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RELATIONSHIP_NETWORK = #{relationshipNetwork,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PURCHASING_POWER_RATING_LV = #{purchasingPowerRatingLv,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHARACTERISTIC = #{characteristic,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where APP_NO = #{appNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
